ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa walked around the desert, night was falling (Is it okay for night to fall in Plintissa s area?) and she didn t believe her luck. Her scanner was

Plintissa walked around the desert, night was falling (Is it okay for night=
 to fall in Plintissa's area?) and she didn't believe her luck. Her scanner=
 was broken, Artist's scanner was broken or he was too stupid to use it, pr=
obably the latter, and she was hungry, there wasn't anything but sand out h=
ere. Now that the sun was going down, it started to cool down and Plintissa=
 was calmed. Plintissa walked on, thinking about how miserable life had bee=
n to her, and that it only intended to get worse, why did she come to this =
planet anyway? Why did she leave Cybertron? She remembered that she did ind=
eed have ONE friend on Cybertron, a friend that loved her with all heart, o=
nly problem was, Plintissa didn't love this friend back, because the friend=
 was a fembot. Plintissa's old friend was eventually killed by some bots in=
 the shadows, never did catch those creeps neither. She later learned that =
the murderers were a couple that had killed millions, but somehow always il=
luded the cops. Stupid police, never good enough when you need them to be R=
EALLY good, maybe she was expecting too much. Plintissa seen something but =
assumed it was a mirage, she assumed right...

Artist walked along the dese=
rt, tapping his scanner, it was broken. Either Plintissa's scanner was brok=
en or she was too stupid to use it, probably the latter, he couldn't believ=
e his luck! Artist walked through the desert, thinking about how boring his=
 life was, he walked through the desest, he served crippled bots, he hung a=
round, he did good things and never was even noticed, he was tired of it al=
l! The Maximals needed a hero, he brung it to them, they never payed him an=
y mind! Artist held his head in rage, his headache swelling, he snarled a s=
narl not normally done by wovles. He transformed to Beast mode and ran acro=
ss the desert, howling and remembering. He impaled Plintissa on a broken of=
f autogun, he impaled Sinesis the same way, Plintissa blew him to pieces? H=
e screamed in arge and passed out...

Dracona walked around the corner, she=
 wouldn't miss the chance to screw something up in the Pred base since nobo=
dy seemed to be there! Dracona slowly made for the entrance...

Gangon's sp=
ark started going dim and started to fade, seeing as how it has been sepera=
ted from it's body for so long...

Sinesis woke up from Stasis lock and pul=
led away from Blizzard, in extreme pain, he pulled past Quickstrike andf th=
rew Sinister's parts into a CR Tank. Then falling in himself, going into st=
asis lock. (Orchid is unable to reply at the moment, so I went ahead and to=
ok my characters to the CR Chamber, don't want them dead.)

The Radicons we=
nt on eating the stuff and Train Wreck took the time to examine it.

"This =
was made with poisonous verries and poisonous mushrooms." Train Wreck said.=
 Stranato looked at Arrow with a "Going to kill" look and stood up. He wave=
d for Arrow to come. Arrow started to walk away. Stranato followed him. Arr=
ow ran! Stranato chased him. Blender and Stronghold shrugged and drank beer=
.

"That was still good eating." Stronghold said.

"I don't feel too well."=
 Airbomber said. Stronghold and Blender laughed. Train Wreck rolled his eye=
s and examined the other stuff in the weirf food made by Arrow. Squirrel me=
at? Weird...

Deemos walked right up to the Maximal base, hoping the autogu=
ns wouldn't fire, and headed toward the entrance...
